pros: I've been with CFKC for 3 years. The care and attention the staff provide to our patients is awe inspiring. I'm proud to be affiliated with a company that has provided dialysis services in Central Florida and Brevard for 50 years. Generous and caring CEO and Board of Directors.
cons: Being a small company, many people wear many hats.

review_title: Family type relationships in the past

cons: New employer, not a fan of how they run the company.

review_title: Good Company: Potential to Do Better
job_title: Patient Care Technician in Orlando, FL
pros: The company pays fair. I traveled to other units and some are better than others. They are finally doing things for their employees. Before only some managers would do things to thank employees but now they do snack and events. Benefits are ok. flex schedule and travel pay are pros too. people are retiring so they are promoting. i dont qualify for the positions though.
cons: PCT do not have say and opinions are not considered. RNs think they are better than others and management is ok with that.

pros: The care about their patients and their employees. Things are slowing but surely moving into a company where you know you will be a great part of like family. The Co-workers are friendly and passionate about their jobs.
cons: Things could be a little more organized. The have the tools to become more advance in technology they seem to be really reluctant on doing it.

review_title: There technology is outdated, and are losing patients everyday to the big companies like Davita and fresinius.
pros: Great coworkers not upper manager just your fellow coworkers on the treatment floor. Some are team players working together but other are just there for a paycheck and that's it.
cons: They will work you with more patients then what is legally acceptable. Always short staffed cutting hours and laying people off.

review_title: This is a horrible place to work!
cons: Horrible expensive benefits, and they love to say “we are a small nonprofit and we can’t afford to do better”. This means that on top of the low pay, you’ll pay more for the lousy benefits! CEO is milking His time to further pad his retirement, and he couldn’t care less! High staff turnover! This is a sinking ship, and the invironment is so toxic it should be declared a waste dump!

job_title: Patient Care Technician in Orlando, FL
pros: Benefits  paid time off teamwork at times techs stick together  benefits paid time off teamwork at times tech stick together
cons: Work hours management is awful over worked and under paid high employee turnover  patients are abusive management allows it manager is unprofessional nurses think they are above the tech and management are all nurses so they agree

review_title: Apply elsewhere not a good company
pros: Nothing at all I encourage you to apply to Davita or Fresenius
cons: Management is horrible they treat there PCTs like CRAP and racist as well I would never work for this company AGAIN !

pros: Learning about hemodialysis and helping patients feel better
